overview: Just when you thought hidden-camera shows couldn't get any crazier, "Juiced," the outrageous practical joke show starring NFL Hall of Famer and alleged double-murderer O.J. Simpson, emerges. Taking a page from popular shows like "Candid Camera" and "Punk'd," Simpson and his cohorts perform a host of elaborate practical jokes on unsuspecting "marks" all across the country, and capture it on camera for all the world to see.
title: Juiced with O.J. Simpson
